num_tested_probands.text: The index patient (V:1) was sequenced, and siblings and parents were also sequenced, when available.
Mention of 'the patients' in the abstract suggests a single proband.

num_positive_het_probands.text: The text mentions that mutations in at least five mitochondrial ARSs have already been associated with brain-specific phenotypes, but it does not explicitly state how many heterozygous carriers were identified in this study.

positive_phenotypes.text: moderate ID, microcephaly, ataxia, speech impairment, and aggressive behavior
The text mentions that the probands have a similar accompanying features (Table 1), but it does not explicitly state what those features are.

num_compound_or_double_hets.text: The text mentions that the second family has a 'compound DNA-alterations' affecting the WARS2 gene, but it does not provide information on how many individuals have this genotype.
